definitions.definition: to laugh at someone or say unkind things about them, either because you are joking or because you want to upset that person:
examples: I used to hate being teased about my red hair when I was at school.

definitions.definition: someone who is always teasing people:
examples: Johnny, don't be such a tease - leave your sister alone!

definitions.definition: someone who enjoys causing sexual excitement and interest in people she or he does not intend to have sex with
